title: Gold ADC/SUPP Main LF DUO
body:
Hi im Jayden.
Ive been supporting since season 3 so i would feel more comfortable in the support role in the duo however i have greatly increased my adc skills over the past season.  Just add me in game and hit me up and we can start as soon as possible :) .

Supports: 
Thresh     Nami    Braum     Leona

Adc:
Vayne     Jinx      Cait      Ezreal

replies.body: Hi, I main adc...currently in silver 2 but Im pretty sure i should be gold, just need a good duo partner. Plz give me a shot with a few normals before you make your decision. cheers
